alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kent; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Western Kent (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 28 at 3:09PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...LIGHT WINTRY MIX COULD RESULT IN HAZARDOUS TRAVEL LATE TONIGHT INTO THE WEDNESDAY MORNING COMMUTE... A period of light rain and snow overspreads southern New England tonight into early Wednesday. Precipitation will change over to a mix of snow, sleet and freezing rain generally across southern Worcester County, Hampden County, northern Connecticut and northern Rhode Island. Snowfall accumulations of up to one half inch are possible on grassy surfaces. There also may be a light glaze of ice. Any untreated surfaces could become slippery. Motorists traveling late tonight and early Wednesday morning will want to allow extra time to reach their destination as roads may be slippery.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kent; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Western Kent
